name: Worker Profile Management
description: Comprehensive worker profile management with contact information and emergency details

prd.problem: Managing detailed information about crew members is currently scattered across multiple systems or paper records, making it difficult to access critical worker information quickly and maintain up-to-date employee records.
prd.solution: Create a centralized worker profile system that stores all essential employee information including contact details, employment history, certifications, and identification photos. Profiles should be easily accessible and updatable with appropriate access controls.
successCriteria: Complete worker profiles with all essential information
Photo upload and storage for crew identification
Employment history tracking (hire date, promotions, etc.)
Role-based access controls for sensitive information
Quick search and filtering of worker roster
risks: Privacy regulations (GDPR, state laws) require careful data handling
Photo requirements may have legal implications
Data security is critical for PII
